content: lessuselesss: Made significant documentation contributions with two merged PRs, including a major update to CONTRIBUTING.md (#1053, +7175/-26134 lines) and adding a Hebrew README translation (#1023). Created and saw the closure of 3 issues related to documentation improvements and build system support. Currently has an open PR (#1157) to add Nix flake support, showing sporadic but impactful activity focused primarily on documentation (63% of changes).
